content: WHAT CRASH? Â WHAT CORRECTION??!? WHAT BEAR MARKET??   Â Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Yes...I am still in a good mood so giving out a CYPHER HODL 3d PRINTED COIN Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  KEEP ON HODLING FELLAS!!! Â  Â Â Â I have some 3D priinted coin prototypes that I will give away...it also comes with a used holo as I was experimenting with these.Â Free shipping in the USA, if overseas I can ship to MinerJones and you pay him for handling and reshippingOnly one spot per person.No NEWBIES registered anytime after 1st FebruaryONLY ONE RULE>> PICK A Â NUMBER NO RANDOMS PLEASE..sorry randoms will be ignoredÂ Â Â  I also suggest using Â privnote.com to send me your addy via PM once raffle winner wants to get in touch with me.Its for your privacy. Â  Â You have to reach out to me when winning. If items are stolen or does not arrive because of thievery in the postal system I am not sending a new one.Read all of this and then decide if you want in or not. I am not responsible for any failed deliveries.Â I am sending out of the goodness of my heart and that's it. Â  This applied to all auctions in the past and future ones as well as the thread says. Goodluck!DO NOT SEND ME A PM WITH PRIV NOTE... UNLESS YOU WIN THE RAFFLE.If you win yes...if not no! And please send within 24hrs so I can keep track on who won what. Thanks Â  PLEASE PLACE YOUR INFO AS FOLLOWS WHEN PLACING YOUR LETTER OR NUMBERC KROGOTHMANHATTANIt makes my life easier to copy and pasteAnd it keeps me in a good mood too! Just a reminder for everyone past, present and future....Â Â  a) I do this for fun. I am not compensated by anyone and there is no angle in this for me.Â Â  b) I do not hodl onto any addresses they are destroyed each time I place an order.... any repeat winner has to resubmit their addresses.Â Â  c) Pass on the good deeds to others and enjoy Â  and keep on HOLDING!!!!Â Â  d) I reserve the right to refuse anyone from participating in my auctions!Â Â Â Â ********************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************Information threads made byKrogothManhattanà¸¿BitBillsPhysical Bitcoin CreedCrypto Stamp WebsiteBitcoin Postage StampsCypher Hodl-TIMELINEKrogothmanhattan crypto shopBeware of Fake Casascius coins All about Coldkey cardsStorage for your collectablesMTGox yubi and MTGox OTP cardKrogothmanhattan escrow serviceBreached and Scam coin makers listHelp me name my new custom Bitcoin painting Private issue custom made Coldkey krogoth cards Past Collectable Auction or selling prices with links Introducing CYPHER STAMPS by CYPHER POSTAGEMaster Store list of Collectables section sales threadsStamps go digital-Collectable Blockchain postage stamp Free Daily Raffle Rules and posting of received free coins Unique, Rare and All Crypto Collectable Posting Thread with LINKS How to Generate a signed BTC transaction using Electrum and TrezorOffline signing your paper wallet using air gapped phone via ElectrumWanted to share my latest comissioned artwork - comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: 44 - KryptowerkI got a feeling I am winning this thing, so please ship directly to MJ. Â  Since I haven't seen any other pictures other than the one from your OP of these 3D printed coins: Is there also a residue of the hologram on the back of the coin? Were these ever funded; any thread you can direct me to? Thanks!

Â  Since I haven't seen any other pictures other than the one from your OP of these 3D printed coins: Is there also a residue of the hologram on the back of the coin? Were these ever funded; any thread you can direct me to? Thanks!Â Â  Howdy and I hope you do win!Â Â  Â  These 3D coins I am giving away are coins printed without the indent in the back so they were kinda like a test run and also extras I have that I rather give away than hodl onto them...and no most do not have residue on them...yet I will be throwing a peeled hologram in there with the coin itself as I have plenty of experimental peeled holograms!Â Â  Â  And yes, I made 50 of these...all funded with 10,000 Satoshi and also included under the hologram each has a unique NFT with the BTC addy on the NFT coin.Â Â  Â  Â I gave some away to friends and also sodl some as well.Â Â  Â  Â Will not be making anymore as they took alot of effort and time to design...create the NFT...load and assemble...etc etc etc as well.Â Â  Â  Â Hope that answers your questions!
